name: Concourse
headline: AI Agents for corporate finance teams
description: Concourse is building AI agents for corporate finance teams. Concourse works alongside finances teams to assist in day-to-day operations by taking on the most manual and time consuming work. Core to the platform is an AI analyst tailor-built for finance teams that is available at any hour of the day, accessible via natural language, and built with full connectivity to a company’s existing financial systems. Concourse enables team members to more effectively retrieve and analyze data, generate charts and reports, and answer ad-hoc questions.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:fintech; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Matthieu Hafemeister, Founder
founders.description: Ex- Head of Growth @Jeeves (YC S20) & Fintech investor at Andreessen Horowitz

generated_description:
**Concourse: Empowering Corporate Finance Teams with AI**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch, Concourse is taking a bold step into the realm of corporate finance by harnessing the power of artificial intelligence. The company's mission is straightforward: to build AI agents that revolutionize how finance teams operate.

Located in New York, Concourse consists of a lean but dynamic team of six, led by a group partner from Y Combinator, Michael Seibel. Despite its small size, Concourse is making waves with a clear value proposition: automating the most tedious, manual tasks finance teams usually face. This is no small feat considering the depth of data and the complexity required in finance operations.

At the heart of Concourse's offering is its AI analyst, designed specifically for finance. This AI is like having a dedicated analyst at your beck and call—available 24/7, able to interact using everyday language, and fully integrated with a company’s existing financial systems. The platform empowers finance personnel to easily retrieve and analyze data, generate insightful reports, and address ad-hoc inquiries, ultimately allowing them to focus on more strategic initiatives.

Concourse recently secured a substantial $4.7 million seed round, a testament to its potential impact and the confidence of investors like a16z and CRV. The company also emphasizes transparency with prospects by answering key questions about data connectivity, implementation timelines, security measures, accuracy, and pricing on its website.

So, if you’re part of a finance team that’s still wrestling with spreadsheets and manual processes, it might be time to let Concourse take on the heavy lifting. You can learn more or even get early access to their platform on their website: [Concourse](https://concourse.co/).

In summary, Concourse is not just another startup; it’s a pioneer that's looking to redefine what corporate finance can accomplish with the help of advanced AI technology. With their help, the mantra of "stop doing finance manually" is no longer just a catchphrase—it's on the cusp of becoming a reality.
